wikipedia_page.main: Joseph Morris  (14 June 1913 – 11 October 1996) was a Canadian trade unionist mostly noted as the president of the Canadian Labour Congress in the 1970s.

response: *1913 – Joe Morris, English-Canadian lieutenant and trade union leader (d. 1996)
